title: Savage Knights
description: The ghosts of our past have come back to haunt us.Kidnapped and sold to the highest bidder, I’m promised to marry another man, a ruthless Mafia boss who has an ax to grind with the Salvatore brothers.And he wants to use me to get his revenge.The men we thought were hunting me are the least of our problems. As it turns out, the real monsters were right under our noses all along.I have faith my savage knights will find me.I know they will burn down the world for their queen.But our enemies will stop at nothing to destroy our happily ever after.Savage Knights is the third and final book in the Princes of Devil’s Creek series.
author: Jillian Frost
